DESCRIPTION: Slaps the mentioned user/role and sends an image in chat.
EXTENDED: **{{prefix}}slap [user]** ~ Slaps the user, in the face, with a chai~ I mean sends a slap gif to the user.
ALIASES: Slap does not have any aliases.
SELF: Slapping oneself is a great way to keep yourself sharp. But don't do it too hard, it can hurt.
